Title: 1. People
Write-Up Text: The Australian social media landscape is buzzing as people express their opinions and expectations about what they want to see in the upcoming Federal Budget 2023. Some users are calling for an urgent increase in JobSeeker and other income support payments while others are demanding healthcare reforms and general focus on improving people's lives in Australia. Meanwhile there is evidence suggesting that the implementation of the Stage 3 tax cuts could be fiscally irresponsible and very expensive. It is no surprise that the public is carefully observing developments and demanding a budget that best serves their needs.
